channel.title: Dates on The Little Dataset
channel.description: Recent content in Dates on The Little Dataset

item.title: (TGI)Friday the 13th
item.description: Intro I was born on November 13th, 1992. And, while that might be sufficient information to verify my identity to that pre-recorded human on the other end of my calls to the bank, there is an important detail always excluded in this formal expression of oneâ€™s birth date: the day of the week. And what makes this seemingly unremarkable fact about me exciting (or disturbing, depending on your take) is that pesky, frequently ignored detail.
